channel.title: Npc Config Help
channel.description:
Basically Theres 2 files npclist.cfg and npc spawn cfg.
Could someone please explain which ones which and what there used for
also
npc = 2745 702 800 99 2 0 150 60 4 Tztok-Jad This_is_gonna_hurt.
i dont no whats the x coords or Y or anything
also this in npcspawn.cfg
spawn = 2745 3229 3782 -8 0 0 0 0 0 Jad

item.title: Npc Config Help
item.dc:creator: @Lildutchboy Lildutchboy
item.description:
@Lildutchboy wrote:

well Npcspawn is where you spawn the npcs for your server and it is like this
//------NpcID—CoordX–CoordY–Height–RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType
spawn = # x coord y coor 0 0 0 0 0 description

always hit tab when spacing but start when it is x coord but idk what other thing is sorry hope you find it out.

Read full topic
